attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask that the powers that be ensure Brown reads these petitions especially this one which tells him that 61 million people hate his guts and cannot wait to see his smug face as he exits Downing street for the last time

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
